title: What are the major benefits of science and technology to society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Having a grasp of all of them transforms a man into a legend. Science: Studying science gives you an idea of possible things in nature, describes mechanism and all natural phenomena which makes you sane. Technology: Technology or engineering is art or knowledge of transforming scientific principles in machines or gadgets which make human life easier. So having a sense of it makes you really crazy about science. Society: Understanding society exposes you to its merits and demerits, needs of society, upcoming changes with time which makes you a businessman and tells you where to use your scientific knowledege and technical skill for advancement of society. Having excellence in all three makes you a lengend….i.e,

Without science and technology, we’d all be living in caves - eating only food we could catch with our bare hands. The moment we started using fire and pointed sticks - we had science and technology to thank for it.
